mapper.sql: id, house_id, money, name, state, worker_id, worker_name, defined_worker_id, istest, create_date, modify_date
id, house_id as houseId, money, name, state, worker_id as workerId, worker_name as workerName, defined_worker_id as definedWorkerId, istest, create_date as createDate, modify_date as modifyDate
mapper.select: select sum(wd.money) from dj_worker_worker_detail as wd where wd.state=0 and wd.worker_id=#{workerId}

select DATE_FORMAT(d.create_date, '%Y-%m') month from dj_worker_worker_detail as d where d.worker_id=#{workerId} and DATE_FORMAT(d.create_date, '%Y-%m') > DATE_FORMAT( date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL 12 month),'%Y-%m') GROUP BY month ORDER BY d.create_date DESC
